text: Pretty big news: DOJ announced this morning that the chairman of Harvard's chemistry department was arrested in connection with aiding China. Another Chinese national was arrested & charged w/attempting to smuggle 21 vials of biological research to China.  https://t.co/krfAHKsH0X
